DOC.brief_summary: The aim study generate pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic data identify safe-effective dose empagliflozin child adolescent age 10 less 18 year type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Single Dose Trial Empagliflozin Children Adolescents With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Children adolescents type 2 diabetes mellitus Insufficient glycaemic control ( HbA1c < =10.5 % ) despite diet exercise and/or metformin and/or stable basal MDI insulin Negative Islet Cell Antigen Glutamic Acid Decarboxylase autoantibodies fast Cpeptide level > = 0.85 ng/ml BMI > 50th percentile age sex Exclusion criterion : Uncontrolled hyperglycaemia glucose level > 240 mg/dl ( > 13.3 mmol/l ) History acute metabolic decompensation diabetic ketoacidosis within 3 month screen visit exception acute decompensation time type 2 diabetes diagnosis Treatment weight reduction medication within 4 week randomisation
